prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with dark feathers and bright red eyes.
Imagine a bird Pokemon that excels in urban environments and has a sleek design.
Design a medium-sized Pokemon that features sharp wings and a keen gaze.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the forest with a striking black and blue color scheme.
